items.name: Forerunner® 165 Series
items.text: You’re a runner who has moved beyond just running. You’re ready to train brilliantly. With a bright AMOLED display, training metrics, wellness insights, and optional music your goals are about to be met.

items.name: Enduro™ 2
items.text: You’re an ultra racer. You need a multisport GPS watch that can go to extremes — with solar charging, incredible GPS battery life and built-in mapping to help you stay ahead of the pack.

items.name: Forerunner® 55
items.text: See yourself as a runner. Get the easy-to-use GPS running smartwatch that encourages running and healthy lifestyles.

items.name: Venu® 3 Series
items.text: You’ve got health and fitness goals and want an on-wrist coach to support you. This GPS smartwatch that can make calls and send texts when connected to your smartphone is the one.

items.name: tactix® 7 Series
items.text: You want to be field-ready. You want specialized GPS smartwatches with tactical features, built-in flashlights, routable TOPO mapping and more.

items.name: epix™ Series
items.text: You’re an athlete who refuses to compromise. Wherever you’re going, only the best will do. Get the ultimate high-performance smartwatch with a stunning AMOLED display, optional built-in LED flashlight, advanced training metrics and more.

items.color: Sapphire, Titanium with Spark Orange/Graphite Silicone Band
items.name: fēnix® 8 Series
items.text: You’re an athlete or adventurer looking to push beyond limits with a smartwatch offering advanced strength training, sports apps, 24/7 health monitoring, dynamic round-trip routing and more.

items.name: Lily® 2 Series
items.text: You’re trendy, health-focused and connected to your world. These small, stylish smartwatches are too. Meet your new favorite accessory.

items.color: Aviator Smartwatch with Vented Titanium Bracelet
items.name: D2™ Mach 1 Series
items.text: You’re a pilot. You want a larger premium GPS smartwatch with a built-in flashlight and the most advanced tools for flying — plus long battery life and health/fitness features that keep you on top.

items.name: MARQ® Golfer (Gen 2)
items.text: You want to stay on top of your game on and off the green. You need a luxury modern tool watch built from Grade-5 titanium with an AMOLED display, virtual caddie and more.
